job_tasks.phrase: Backend- en frontend-services ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, monitoren en optimaliseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the design, development, and optimization of software services, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van integraties met verschillende API's van onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: Building integrations with APIs is a core software development task, involving connecting different systems through defined interfaces.
Integrating with contact centers also involves building software connections and functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan de UI om documenttraining en aanmoediging toegankelijk te maken voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: Working on the UI to make features accessible is a front-end software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het verbeteren van onze code en voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven
job_tasks.justification: This describes code refactoring and writing maintainable and scalable services, which are key software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Het potentieel van digitale transformatie op het werk te benutten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of broader business goals related to digital transformation.
The mention of LLM (Large Language Models) and neural networks indicates involvement with AI modeling, although the specific tasks are not detailed.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks (backend/frontend services, APIs, UI). While it mentions LLMs and AI, it lacks specific details on core generative AI engineering tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning. The focus seems to be on building applications that *use* AI rather than deeply engineering the AI models themselves.
